comments.author: haliy-2017
comments.created_time: March 17, 2023, 06:33:40 PMLast edit: March 17, 2023, 06:44:06 PM by haliy-2017
comments.body: I can’t withdraw from my wallet to the exchange, how can I fix it?Writes:Fee estimation failed.Fallbackfee is disabled.Wait a few blocks or enable -fallbackfee.Where to turn it on in the wallet?

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.body: Quote from: haliy-2017 on March 17, 2023, 06:33:40 PMI can’t withdraw from my wallet to the exchange, how can I fix it?Writes:Fee estimation failed.Fallbackfee is disabled.Wait a few blocks or enable -fallbackfee.Where to turn it on in the wallet?select custom and put whatever amount you want as fee

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.created_time: February 19, 2025, 08:16:30 PMLast edit: February 20, 2025, 10:08:00 AM by jaybitron
comments.body: Kylacoin (KCN) is now officially integrated into the Komodo Wallet, with support for both the native Kylacoin mainnet and the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) contract. This integration is built on our previously announced Electrum servers, ensuring reliable and efficient transaction handling.The Komodo Wallet is officially available at https://app.komodoplatform.com/wallet, and desktop versions can be downloaded from https://downloads.f1ex.org/komodo-wallet-desktop/.This integration marks a significant step forward in expanding Kylacoin’s ecosystem. Further announcements will follow as development continues.
